name: Requests received by controller
description: This PromQL query measures the total count of requests received by a specific controller, including both successful and failed requests.
question: How many requests were received by the controller?

name: Total req/s
description: This PromQL query measures the total number of requests per second over a specific time range.

name: Request duration (controller-handled requests only)
description: This PromQL query measures the duration of requests that are handled by ASP.NET Core controllers, excluding any requests that were not mapped to a controller.
question: What is the average duration of requests handled by ASP.NET Core controllers?

name: Request duration (controller-handled requests only)
description: This PromQL query measures the duration of requests that are handled by ASP.NET Core controllers, excluding any requests that were not mapped to a controller.
question: What is the maximum duration of requests handled by ASP.NET Core controllers?
